sndlib.core.statistics
Class SolutionStatistics

java.lang.Object
  sndlib.core.statistics.SolutionStatistics
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<SolutionStatisticValueKey>
public class SolutionStatistics
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides the common methods to calculate statistics of a given Solution of a network design problem (respectively a SolvedProblem).

An instance of this class obtained by one of the static factory methods acts as a container for the calculated statistic values and caches them for future requests. It provides methods to iterate over all values or to query a single specific value.

Author:
Roman Klaehne
See Also:
